{% endfor %}


/*
 * Forvard declaration of structs
 */

{% for group in parser.structs
    | selectattr("file", "equalto", parser.root_struct_def.file)
    | groupby("defined_namespace") %}
{% for component in group.grouper.components %}
namespace {{ component }} {
{% endfor %}

{% for struct_def in group.list|sort(attribute="name") %}
class {{ struct_def.name|escape_cpp_keyword }};
{% endfor %}

{% for component in group.grouper.components|reverse %}
}  // {{ component }}
{% endfor %}
{% endfor %}


/*
 * Declaration of enums
 */

{% for group in parser.enums
    | selectattr("file", "equalto", parser.root_struct_def.file)
    | groupby("defined_namespace") %}
{% for component in group.grouper.components %}
namespace {{ component }} {
{% endfor %}

{% for enum_def in group.list|sort(attribute="name") %}

{% include "lazy.h/enum.txt" %}
{% endfor %}

{% for component in group.grouper.components|reverse %}
}  // {{ component }}
{% endfor %}
{% endfor %}


/*
 * Declaration of structs
 */

{% for group in parser.structs
    | selectattr("file", "equalto", parser.root_struct_def.file)
    | groupby("defined_namespace") %}
{% for component in group.grouper.components %}
namespace {{ component }} {
{% endfor %}

{% for table_def in group.list|sort(attribute="name") %}

{% include "lazy.h/table.txt" %}
{% endfor %}

{% for component in group.grouper.components|reverse %}
}  // {{ component }}
{% endfor %}
{% endfor %}
